text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
Congratulations, Trainer☆ 
And congratulations to me too★

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
You're curious why we're celebrating? 
Just think about it!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
You could've gone anywhere else, right? 
And there was a chance that I wouldn't 
have come here either!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
But you're standing here right now 
talking to me! It's a miracle against 
astronomical odds☆

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
This moment right now is marvelous☆ 
That's why I'm congratulating you! 
And myself!
